name: pixiv touch Cleanup
description: 広告とプレミアム関係の項目を消します
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("touch.pixiv.net") {
  /* プレミアム */
  span.premium_info_bar_span_ios,
  section.popular-search-pr,
  img[src="http://source.pixiv.net/touch/touch/img/cmn/premium.png"],
  span.premium_info_bar_span_an,
  div.premium-button,
  a[href="/history.php"],
  a[href="/history.php?type=novel"],
  li.separator+li.bookmark+li.bookmark,
  li.premium,
  nav.bookmark-ranges,
  div#popular-search-introduction-modal,
  p#popular-search-tag-list+h1.hot-tags,
  p#popular-search-tag-list+h1.hot-tags+a,
  p#popular-search-tag-list+h1.hot-tags+a+ul.center,
  section.showcase,
  /* 広告 */
  iframe,
  div#ad-header,
  div#ad-footer,
  div.hide-ads,
  section.comic-banner,
  li.grid_ad,
  div#ad-caption-under,
  div.pixiv_game-list,
  div.pixiv_game,
  div#ad-comment-tag,
  div.ad-container,
  nav.manga_banner,
  /* その他 */
  nav.sub,
  div.btnbar,
  nav.member_nav_small,
  a.booth,
  div.share,
  div.reveal-modal-bg,
  a.follow-button,
  div.imageconstainer>img,
  section.spotlight,
  section.contests,
  section.contest-pickup,
  section.promo-novel,
  section#sub-header>nav.nav-portal>ul.four>li+li+li+li,
  div.profile>div.profile,
  li.mini-profile>a>div.photo,
  a.site-name,
  section#favorite-tags-area+h1.hot-tags,
  section#favorite-tags-area+h1.hot-tags+ul.tags,
  section#favorite-tags-area+h1.hot-tags+ul.tags+br+h1.hot-tags,
  section#favorite-tags-area+h1.hot-tags+ul.tags+br+h1.hot-tags+ul#popular-tags
  {display:none!important}
}

@-moz-document domain("dic.pixiv.net") {
  /* 広告 */
  iframe,
  div.ad-mobile-anchor,
  /* XXX */
  footer,
  div#infobar_touch,
  div.centerize>img#hakutaku_icon,
  div#bottom_spotlight_touch,
  XXX
  {display:none!important
  }}
